org.opentcs.access.queries

Class Queries

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opentcs.access.queries.Queries
  • Deprecated. 
    Not really an API class.

    @Deprecated
 @ScheduledApiChange(when="5.0",
                    details="Will be removed.")
public final class Queries
extends java.lang.Object
    Convenience methods for working with queries.

      • availableInState

        public static java.util.Set<java.lang.Class<? extends Query<?>>> availableInState(java.util.Set<java.lang.Class<? extends Query<?>>> queries,
                                                                                  Kernel.State state)
        Deprecated. 
        Returns a set of queries that are in the given set of queries and are available in the given kernel state.
        Parameters:
        queries - The queries to be filtered.
        state - The state in which the returned queries must be available.
        Returns:
        A set of queries that are in the given set of queries and that are available in the given kernel state. If there are no such queries, the returned set is empty.

      • availableInState

        public static java.util.Set<java.lang.Class<? extends Query<?>>> availableInState(Kernel.State state)
        Deprecated. 
        Returns a set of queries that are available in the given kernel state.
        Parameters:
        state - The state in which the returned queries must be available.
        Returns:
        A set of queries that are available in the given kernel state. If there are no such queries, the returned set is empty.

      • availableInState

        public static boolean availableInState(java.lang.Class<? extends Query<?>> query,
                                       Kernel.State state)
        Deprecated. 
        Checks whether the given query is available in the given kernel state.
        Parameters:
        query - The query to be checked.
        state - The kernel state.
        Returns:
        true if, and only if, the given query is available in the given kernel state.
